text: Razia Sultan is an Indian historical television Soap Opera drama. The show tells story of the first Indian women sultana of Delhi Razia Sultana. The was produced by Swastik Pictures. The show was shown on television from 2 March 2015 to 23 October 2015. ==Plot== During the 13th century, Iltutmish, the sultan of Delhi, appoint his daughter Razia as the head of the state. Razia Sultana fought oppositions from conformists in establishing a flourishing kingdom. ==Cast== * Pankhuri Awashthy as Razia Sultana. ==References== Category:2010s Indian television series Category:2010s soap operas Category:2015 Indian television series debuts Category:2015 Indian television series endings Category:Hindi-language television series
title: Razia Sultan (TV series)
